name: acciioAIR
0:
”Alexa, turn on AC”
”Alexa, turn off AC”
”Alexa, set AC to 27 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
acciio AIR is an air conditioner controller.

Prerequisites:
 - acciio AIR device(s)
 - an acciio AIR application (available on the App Store & Google Play Store)
 - an acciio AIR account which can be created in the application.

For more information, please visit https://www.acciio.com/en
